name: Frostbite
description: Frostbite is a mostly sativa strain whose trichome-covered flowers look as if they should be frosty to the touch. The strainâ€™s aroma is warmer, evoking earthy and spicy, tea-like notes. These plants do best when grown indoors, flowering at 8 to 9 weeks and producing heavy yields.
